Plot: Two hip detectives protect a murder witness while investigating a case of stolen heroin.
Title: Bad Boys
Writer: George Gallo (story), Michael Barrie (screenplay), Jim Mulholland (screenplay), Doug Richardson (screenplay)
Actors: Lisa Boyle, Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Michael Taliferro
tomatoConsensus: Bad Boys stars Will Smith and Martin Lawrence have enjoyable chemistry; unfortunately, director Michael Bay too often drowns it out with set pieces and explosions in place of an actual story.
